entry.title: JSåˆ¤æ–­æ—¥æœŸæ˜¯ä¸€å¹´ä¸­çš„æŸä¸€å¤©
entry.content:
// æ–¹æ³•ä¸€ï¼šä½¿ç”¨æ•°ç»„
        function judgeDay() {
            var sum = 0; //è¦è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœ
            var Date1 = new Date();
            var arr = [31, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31];
            var year = Date1.getFullYear();
            var month = Date1.getMonth();
            var day = Date1.getDate();
            for (var i = 0; i < month + 1; i++) {
                sum += arr[i];
            }
            if (judgeYear(year)) {
                sum++;
            }
            sum += day;
            return sum;
        }


        function judgeYear(year) {
            if ((year % 4 == 0 && year % 100 != 0) || year % 400 == 0) {
                return true;
            }
            return false;
        }
        
        ```
         // æ–¹æ³•äºŒï¼šä½¿ç”¨switch
        function switchJudge() {
            var sum = 0; //è¦è¿”å›çš„ç»“æœ
            var Date1 = new Date();
            var year = Date1.getFullYear();
            var month = Date1.getMonth() + 1;
            var day = Date1.getDate();
            switch (month) {
                case 12:
                    sum += 31;
                case 11:
                    sum += 30;
                case 10:
                    sum += 31;
                case 9:
                    sum += 30;
                case 8:
                    sum += 31;
                case 7:
                    sum += 31;
                case 6:
                    sum += 30;
                case 5:
                    sum += 31;
                case 4:
                    sum += 30;
                case 3:
                    sum += 31;
                case 2:
                    sum += 28;
                case 1:
                    sum += 31;
                default:
                    if (judgeYear(year)) {
                        sum++
                    }
                    break;

            }
            sum += day;
            return sum;
        }
